entry.title: More Adventures- starring Alchemist
entry.summary:
Author: velvet_alchemist

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,517Chapters: 11/15Kudos: 0

Summary: In this follow-up series, Alchemist tries to find connections between the simulation incident and her dad, all while the Court watches in the darkness.Will she finally solve everything and figure out the truth?TW: inaccurate medical information, I tried my best to research but nothing in the story is a completely accurate portrayal of medical procedures.
